text: @Pastor__West This is not something that will just end, but i trust and believe in God and all His plans for myself, my loved ones, and all His children. I know as easily as He can give, He can also take away. So if it not end..A vaccine for COVID-19 will be found soon🙌🏽in Jesus name! AMEN🙏🏽
